查词历史：

available
高频词，一定要记住哦！
音节划分：avail▪able

available
[英] [əˈveiləbl] [美] [əˈveləbəl] 生词本

  • 简明释义

  • 同反义词

  • 更多资料

adj.

同义词

adj.
    1. “在手边的;可得到的”释义下的同义词
    obtainable convenient ready at hand handy
    其他释义下的同义词
    hand accessible handy obtainable void convenient unoccupied single ready in at

反义词

adj.
    1. “可利用的;可得到的”释义下的反义词
    unavailable

    相关词

  • available accommodation available alkali available buoyance available capacity available capital available cash available coefficient available construction surplus available conversion gain available cost available credit available current surplus available data available dilution available draft available earned surplus available factor available fertilizer available fund available heating value

    派生词

  • availability availableness

    语源

  • late Middle English (in the senses 'effectual, serviceable and legally valid'): from avail + -able. The sense 'at someone's disposal' dates from the early 19th cent

  • 柯林斯高阶英汉双解学习词典

    《柯林斯COBUILD高阶英汉双解学习词典》（Collins COBUILD Advanced Learner's English-Chinese Dictionary）是柯林斯公司携手外研社为中国学习者量身定制的全新版本，突出强调了学习型词典的学习功能，同时在可读性和易用性方面均有大幅提升。

  • 英英释义

  • 行业释义

  • 词典例句

下载新品“金山背单词” 参与有奖公测！
1. ADJ
形容词
 能找到的；可获得的 If something you want or need is available, you can find it or obtain it. 

  • Since 1978, the amount of money available to buy books has fallen by 17%...

    自1978年以来，可用于采购图书的经费已经减少了17％。

  • There are three small boats available for hire...

    有3艘小船可供出租。

  • According to the best available information, the facts are these.

    根据最可靠的消息，事实如下。

availability

  • ...the easy availability of guns.

    枪支的唾手可得

2. ADJ
形容词
 有空的;有暇的 Someone who is available is not busy and is therefore free to talk to you or to do a particular task. 
【搭配模式】：v-link ADJ

  • Mr Leach is on holiday and was not available for comment.

    利奇先生休假了，不方便作出评论。

Adjective

1. obtainable or accessible and ready for use or service;

  • "kept a fire extinguisher available"
  • "much information is available through computers"
  • "available in many colors"
  • "the list of available candidates is unusually long"
  • antonym： unavailable

2. not busy; not otherwise committed;

  • "he was not available for comment"
  • "he was available and willing to accompany her"
  • synonym： uncommitted

3. convenient for use or disposal;

  • "the house is available after July 1"
  • "2000 square feet of usable office space"
  • synonym： usable，useable

计算机

  • 1.可用的
  • 2.;有效的;存在的
1. A detailed list of our publications is available on request.
我们的出版物有一份详细的目录备索。

来自《简明英汉词典》

2. A limited number of cars is available.
汽车使用数目有限制。

来自《现代汉英综合大词典》

3. All the evidence of the crime is available.
罪证俱在。

来自《现代汉英综合大词典》

4. All varieties of goods for daily use are available.
日用百货一应俱全。

来自《现代汉英综合大词典》

5. Firearms are not freely available on the open market.
武器不能在公开市场上自由出售。

来自《简明英汉词典》

6. Further to our letter of February 5th, we can now confirm that all the spare parts you requested are available.
为了对我们二月五号那封信作进一步的说明，我们现在可以保证你们所要的零件都有现货。

来自《简明英汉词典》

7. Goods of every description are available.
货色齐全。

来自《现代汉英综合大词典》

8. He is not available for the job.
他不适宜做这个工作。

来自《现代英汉综合大词典》

9. Her money is tied up in securities and is not available to her at present.
她的钱用来买了股票，目前她还不能支用。

来自《简明英汉词典》

10. I am sending you the book, together with all the available comments on it.
我把这本书连同所有的评论寄给你。

来自《现代汉英综合大词典》

11. I'll send you all the periodicals available.
我将把我能得到的期刊给你寄去。

来自《简明英汉词典》

12. I'm afraid your order has caught us on the hop—the goods aren't available yet.
恐怕你的订单来得太突然，我们全无准备，目前尚无货源。

来自《简明英汉词典》

13. It is both cheap and abundantly available.
它不仅便宜而且产量丰富。

来自《简明英汉词典》

14. It may be objected that not enough manpower is available.
有人可能会提出反对，认为没有足够的人力可用。

来自《简明英汉词典》

15. It's only available in hardback.
这本书只有精装本。

来自《简明英汉词典》

16. My bicycle is not available, and it is being repaired.
我的自行车现在不能用，因为正在修理。

来自《简明英汉词典》

17. My calculation is based on notional figures, since the actual figures are not yet available.
因尚无实际数字，我是根据估计的数字计算的。

来自《简明英汉词典》

18. No funding will be available until the technology is completely proven.
该技术得到充分验证后才会有拨款。

来自《简明英汉词典》

19. No legal aid was available to cover representation before tribunals.
法律援助不包括裁判庭代表的费用。

来自《简明英汉词典》

20. Only tickets for Shenyang and beyond are available.
只售沈阳以远的车票。

来自《现代汉英综合大词典》
